text: Henry Bertram Mayo, D.Phil, FRSC, (--) was a Canadian political scientist. At the time of his death, he was Canada's oldest living Rhodes Scholar,Luminus - Fall/Winter 2006/07 Vol. 31 No. 2 | Alumni Connections and professor emeritus at Carleton University, Ottawa.Carleton University - Department of Political Science Born in Fortune, Newfoundland, Mayo taught at a number of universities, received multiple honorary degrees and was president of the Canadian Political Science Association.CPSA Presidents / Présidents ACSP ==Partial bibliography== Newfoundland and Confederation in the Eighteen Sixties, Canadian Historical Review, 1948.Bibliography for Government and Politics: Newfoundland and Labrador Heritage An Introduction to Democratic Theory, Oxford University Press, 1960.An Introduction to Democratic Theory by H.
